column2: As I stand here"," I am drenched.""",,,,,,,,

column1: ・a・ﾋ・J・ｩ・ｹ	tonodo hirakase	open the door of the hall	The door I beg you open.,,,,,,,,,,
・P・・	kasugai mo	there is no metal tie	"Neither a bolt, no,"

column3: no lock is there at all
column4: Nor a bar", no, have I to fasten,"

column3: push it open and come in
column4: Just push it open", love, and come in,"
For I am no one else's.

column2: Markham", Elizabeth. Saibara: Japanese Court Songs of the Heian Period. Vol. 2. Cambridge: Cambridge UP," 1983. Print. ""
